item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 8, 2024 at 1:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. An open discussion forum for ArXiv papers (164 points | 53 comments)
2. PC Floppy Copy Protection: Softguard Superlok (26 points | 8 comments)
3. Goodbye Tinder, hello Strava: have 'hobby' apps become the new social networks? (53 points | 29 comments)
4. WebP: The WebPage Compression Format (426 points | 152 comments)
5. Cruise ships chopped in half are a license to print money (117 points | 57 comments)
6. Baiting the bot (75 points | 33 comments)
7. Asking the Wrong Questions (2017) (133 points | 68 comments)
8. Cracking an old ZIP file to help open source the ANC's "Vula" secret crypto code (227 points | 24 comments)
9. Concrete clickbait: next time you share a spomenik photo, think abt what it mean (13 points | discuss)
10. How a 16th Century Explorer's Sailing Ship Works (26 points | 2 comments)
11. LuaJIT PR: Add Support for RISC-V 64 (26 points | 1 comment)
12. Microui+fenster=Small GUI (107 points | 14 comments)
13. Keyhole – Forge own Windows Store licenses (555 points | 255 comments)
14. Dogs can remember names of toys years after not seeing them, study shows (257 points | 138 comments)
15. A new rare high-rank elliptic curve, and an orchard of Diophantine equations (180 points | 11 comments)
16. CitizenDJ – Make music using free audio and video from the Library of Congress (154 points | 8 comments)
17. Rethinking Addiction as a Chronic Brain Disease (11 points | 8 comments)
18. Battlestar Galactica: Technical Manual (2005) (41 points | 20 comments)
19. Appalachian Trail Hiker Photo Archive (111 points | 20 comments)
20. The worsening Raspberry Pi RP2350 E9 erratum situation (45 points | 4 comments)
21. The "email is authentication" pattern (221 points | 311 comments)
22. WordPerfect for Unix Character Terminals (29 points | 12 comments)
23. Early science and stone engineering in Menga, a Neolithic dolmen (18 points | discuss)
24. Gnome Files: A detailed UI examination (243 points | 157 comments)
25. Groups underpin modern math (83 points | 32 comments)
26. Beyond Ctrl-C: The dark corners of Unix signal handling (105 points | 38 comments)
27. GPT-fabricated scientific papers on Google Scholar (162 points | 86 comments)
28. Things to know about the Great Wave (239 points | 78 comments)
29. Hallelujah, Leonard Cohen, and a Pulitzer Prize-winning writer's suicide (141 points | 80 comments)
30. The little-known life of the scarfing tool (9 points | 1 comment)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 8, 2024 at 1:15 PM UTC
